attributes.action: To hire big well known business men that can help run the country and bring Britain out off the mess!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I think Westminster can do without petty arguments, watching on tv is absolutely embarrasing!
Its almost like "a bunch of school children arguing and misbehaving".

Parliament can do with people like big well known business men, like sir alan sugar and many more, even nick hewer would be good to bring in as an MP.

This will certainly settle some of the goings on in Westminster, right now you and even David Cameron need to put your heads down, throw away the argument and start running the country together, for the first time, this must change!

As of me, im 19yrs of age, im not confident, and I have been applying everywhere where I am in Peterborough and I am hearing no replies what so ever, I am on jobseekers and my low confidence drives me up the wall! Im now thinking of changing a tactic, perhaps even start a business at 19 with no experience, be like sir alan sugar without his help???

Regards
Michael Hodgson
